summary: When four best friends try and move forward in their work and personal life, they realize that trying to live their life's dream is more difficult than they imagine -- especially in the high fashion world of Shanghai.
cast: Mi Yang|Amber Kuo|Kai Ko|Rhydian Vaughan|Bea Hayden Kuo|Yi-Lin Sie|Cheney Chen|Shiping Cao|Carolyn Chen|Chao Jiang|Qinyun Jiang|Xinlong Li|Kiwi Shang|Lin Wang|Feiyang Yang|Jun Yao|Zhu Zhen
title: Xiao shi dai
